name: iOS 12.4.7
available: iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, and iPod touch 6th generation

advisories.available: iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, and iPod touch 6th generation
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted mail message may lead to unexpected memory modification or application termination
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, and iPod touch 6th generation
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted mail message may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, and iPod touch 6th generation
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Ian Beer of Google Project Zero
